name: Stop Bugging Me (StabAlarash)
description:
Buggy got lost again and need to find the way back to BuggCity, but wait ? What's that loud noise approaching  ? Oh oh...

Made in roughly 2 weeks for the Godot Wild Jam #49

Credits:

Scribblefrog - Graphics

StabAlarah - Code

SecondTierSound - Music

Sofia - Additional Graphics

Special Thanks:
